title: Crystal pickaxe (The Gauntlet)

Advanced data
Item ID23863

A crystal pickaxe is a basic pickaxe that is given to the player at the start of The Gauntlet. It is used to obtain crystal ore from crystal outcrops within the Gauntlet.

Unlike its overworld counterpart, this variant does not have a special attack.

[[File:Crystal pickaxe (The Gauntlet) detail.png|130px|left]]
A '''crystal pickaxe''' is a basic pickaxe that is given to the player at the start of [[The Gauntlet]]. It is used to obtain [[crystal ore]] from crystal outcrops within the Gauntlet.

Unlike its [[crystal pickaxe|overworld counterpart]], this variant does not have a [[special attack]].
